filmJson.name: Movietone
filmJson.fact1: This was one of four sound technologies in development during the 1920s; the others were DeForest Phonofilm, Warner Brothers' Vitaphone, and RCA Photophone
filmJson.fact2: This format had its own specific aspect ratio to accomodate the additional printed soundtrack; other formats used Silent (1.33:1) or Academy (1.375:1) aspect ratios
filmJson.fact3: This format was used for newsreels and a handful of motion pictures
